page.title: 17 FAMILY POSSESSIONS
page.content: In{Abersychan}most people live in {semi-detached private houses}with fairly large gardens but not many people own garages. The majority of people have at least {one telephone. {Holidays}are mostly spent in{Great {Britain,}usually at seaside holiday resorts. Most families keep{pets,}the most popular of which are{birds {(pigeons,budgerigars and canaries) and {dogs. }A large number of people possess{musical instruments}(over 50 instruments ranging from recorders to electronic organs were counted in one class alone). Nearly all the children own both a {bicycle}and{a home computer. Most children have around{50p a week for{pocket money.
